Q：英雄自選劵揀咩英好?
A：有愛>一切
依隻驚無勁唔勁，只有夾唔夾
同埋官方會因應英雄強弱而作出Buff同Nerf嘅調整
今個版本可能弱勢啲，但下個版本可能變神角都未定
所以不如揀咗有邊隻英係你真係鍾意嘅，想用嘅
再係Post度問下有咩組合可以夾佢，咁會比較好
相信各巴絲都好樂意為新手巴絲們解答的

[Patch Note] 22nd Feb 2018


Greetings, Raiders.
This is GM Orvel.

Here comes the Patch Note about updates on 22nd Feb 2018.
* Please be aware that all screenshots were taken from the test server.


[Update Details]----------------------------

[New Costumes]

▶1st Frozen theme Costumes (8 Heroes)
- Frozen them costumes are added.
- You will get Gold +1% / EXP +2% effects upon wearing a costume


:: Lakrak, Lewisia (3 Stars), Rodina, Selene


:: Lorraine, Viska, Baudouin, Clause

[New Content Updates]


▶New Loot Boosting System”
You don’t have to use a Loot Booster item at the specific time!


- You can use rubies to activate a Loot Booster before getting into a battle.
- Loot Boosting System can be stacked with a Loot Booster item and Loot Boost Hot time
(Event) at the same time.
- You can activate the Loot Boosting System on the following maps;
1) Normal battles (Chapter)
2) Conquests
3) Upper Dungeons
4) Tower of Challenge (Only for repeating rewards)
- Along with the Loot Boosting System, ‘Loot Booster Item’ will be removed from
[Special Shop].


:: PLEASE READ!!
- Loot Booster Items in your ‘INVENTORY’ will be SAFE!!

▶New Event Missions
You don’t have to log into the game at the specific time anymore!
You can activate Hot time whenever you want!

- 2 Missions will be added;
1) [The road to fast growth! Use EXP Hot time!]
2) [The road to wealth! Use Gold Hot time!]


- You can find out ‘Hot Time Event Rewards’ via [Mission] → [Event Mission].
- You can claim Hot Time Rewards max 3 times per day. 1 hour hot time will be activated
upon claiming one.
:: Hot Time Rewards will be activated right away by clicking ‘Claim’ button.
- All Hot Time Event Rewards will be reset at every midnight
** Lunch/Dinner Hot Time Rewards will be maintained

[Content Revamps]


▶Inventory Slot Expansion
Are you tired of expanding your Inventory too often? Now you don’t have to worry about it!



- Max Inventory Slot capacity will be expanded to 800 slots.
- But, remember! You CANNOT expand more than 800 slots!
:: You can expand up to 800 slots max. If you reach 800 slots, no more slots will be expanded.


▶Portal Revamp
Portal will enable you to teleport to each map much more conveniently than before.
- Portals: Chapters / Conquests / Upper Dungeons / Last Location
- Chapter Portals will teleport you to the last stage of the Chapter.
- Once you click Conquest / Upper Dungeon Portal button, you will be able to see
the list of stages for each chapter.


▶Upper Dungeon Revamp
You have more chance to obtain fragments.
Now, you can challenge all Upper Dungeons in each Chapter.



- Upper Dungeons will have default entry keys for every chapter.
- Chapter.6 Upper Dungeon stage difficulty will be adjusted: The same difficulty for all stages.
:: Stage 2 and 6 boss stats will be adjusted.
:: Stage 7 Battle waves will be adjusted to 3 waves. (Previous: 4 Waves)
*Due to Upper Dungeon revamp, there will be no Upper Dungeon Double Entry Event
this weekend.
* Upper Dungeon Entry Keys will be reset with the revamp today.

▶May’s General Shop Revamp
May has prepared much higher quality of items.
May will not sell useless items anymore!

- T3 or higher tier gears (Higher than heroic level) will be sold. (Gear cost will be adjusted.)
:: Manticore gears are not included in sales list.
- More amount of Empty Flasks. (Price will be adjusted according to the amount)
- Unique Fragments / Reforge Ticket / Mysterious Rune: Ancient / Mysterious Scroll
and more are added to her sales list.
- Reset List rubies will be much cheaper. (Previous: 50 / Changed: 25)

[Other Revamps & Bug Fixes]


▶Aisha Costume Illustration revamp
- Yukata Aisha illustration has been revamped.

▶Stream mode UI / Chat window have been revamped

▶ Challenge Raid: Urkak battle has been optimized.

▶Purchase confirmation window will be removed upon purchasing gears in the Forge
- You will be able to purchase a gear at once by clicking [Buy] button.

▶ Fixed a bug where a skill was reserved during its cooltime on AUTO battle mode.
- A bug has been fixed where used skill was reserved again even there are more
available skills.


▶ Fixed a bug where you were teleported to Hall or Heroes upon checking New User
Package pop up window.


▶Fixed a bug where items were displayed as ‘Sold’ in Special Shop if you logged into
the game with the secondary account.
- When you logged into the game with your secondary account after purchasing an item
from the Special Shop, there was an error where the item was displayed as ‘Sold’
also in your secondary account. This bug has been fixed.


▶Fixed a bug where cut scenes were not played during Chapter.6 story.


▶ Some heroes’ Transcendence text tooltip errors have been fixed.
- Leo T5 [Light]: Previous: Crit Chance +100 / Changed: P.Block +200
- Mitra T5 [Light]: Previous: Crit Chance +100 / Changed: Crit DMG +20%
- Mirriane T5 [Light]: Previous: Crit Chance +100 / Changed: Crit DMG +20%.
* Skills are working fine in the game. Only tooltip texts will be changed.
▲ Thai, English, and other European languages. (Except Russian)

▶ A bug has been fixed where Transcendence Perks were not activated at the same time
for some heroes.


- Kasel: Valiant Dash (Skill 2) [Dark] / Goddess Strike (Skill 4) [Light]
- Maria: Area of Darkness (Skill 3) [Light] / T5 [Dark]
- Annette: Blasting Ray (Skill 1) [Light] / Process of Elimination (Skill 3) [Dark]
- Cassandra: Softly~ (Skill 1) [Light] / Gentle Touch (Skill 4) [Light]
- Mediana: Healing Salve (Skill 1) [Light] / Strengthening Potion (Skill 3) [Dark]


[Special Shop Updates]


▶NPC Random Present Box (x1/x10), Loot Booster Item will be removed.
:: Ruby Items above will be removed.


▶Gold Package / EXP Package Sales Extension
:: Loot Booster item in the package will be maintained.


[Events]


▶Double the fun with Double the amount
- Period: Thurs, 15th Feb 00:00 – Wed, 28th Feb 23:59:59
- Details: 2x Event for 2 weeks!


1st: Double Ancient Royal Vault Entries / Double Kinship Rate (15th Feb – 21st Feb) (End)
2nd: Room of Purification 50% Discount / Double Stockade Entries (22nd Feb – 28th Feb)
* Please be aware that only 5 keys will be charged upon recharging Stockade.
--------------------------------------------


Thank you
GM Orvel

你可以係windows -> windows 系統 -> 執行
入個指令等佢倒數自動熄機, 指令如下

shutdown -s -t xxxxx

xxxxx 為倒數既秒數...秒數...秒數

你可以係windows -> windows 系統 -> 執行
入個指令等佢倒數自動熄機, 指令如下

shutdown -s -t xxxxx

xxxxx 為倒數既秒數...秒數...秒數

例如倒數一個鐘既就係 3600 秒, 兩個鐘就 7200 秒......如此類推

其實NOX個macro可以設定運行時間
雖然windows cmd熄機都得

因為我部機都買左幾年, 如果成日開通宵好快收皮
想俾部機有時間熄一熄

[Event] Greet the Full Moon with Lanterns!

https://www.plug.game/kingsraid/1030449#/posts/9197



Greetings, Raiders
This is GM Orvel

A new web view event will begin from 1st of March!
This time, it’s an event named ‘Greet the Full Moon with Lanterns!’

Please check more details below!

------------------------------------

Greet the full moon with lanterns!


[Event Details]

1. Period: 1st March 00:00 – Next maintenance
2. Details: Float a lantern every day to see the Full Moon and acquire rewards!

3. Rewards:
Participation Reward: Infinity Fragment (x25) every time you float a lantern
Clear Reward: 100 Rubies

[How to attend the event]

1. Upon consuming 100 stamina, tap the [Float a Lantern] button.
2. You can float 5 lanterns per day, and you will acquire participation rewards every time.
3. After floating 5 lanterns, click [Full Moon] to obtain a Clear Reward.

What happens if you float 5 lanterns and click the Full Moon?

That’s right!!

You will get Infinity Fragment x125 & 100 Rubies!


[Event Note]

1. The event will reset at every midnight
2. To attend the event, you MUST click [Float a Lantern] button.
3. To clear the event, you MUST click [The Full Moon].
4. Unclaimed rewards cannot be recovered/reclaimed.

[How to find Web- view Events]

1) Touch the Scroll Icon on the right upper side of the screen.



2) Click [Event] in Misc. Menu.



Ta- Da!!!



--------------------------------

Do not forget to light a lantern every day!!

From 1st March until next maintenance!

Thank you
GM Orvel

- Details: Special rewards based on how much rubies you’ve spent



* You can attend the Ruby Consume Event via Web- view event window.

- Artifact Ticket (EVENT) will give you any Artifact, except World Boss/Event Artifacts
- Each reward will be given only once.
- Unclaimed rewards cannot be reclaimed/recovered.

--------------------------------
Thank you
GM Orvel

[Balance Patch]

There will be 2 main parts of Balance Patch this time.

First, we are going to balance some heroes and items that are extremely good in PvP.
Some heroes and items were meant to be effective at the same time especially in PvP.
However, these are actually dominating throughout the PvP mode.
So, we are going to make some balance patches to reduce specific skills and item effects that
can dominate the battle, and make other ways to do it instead.

Second, we are going to buff heroes who are weak compared to others.

We are aware that sometimes Pure Dealers actually record much less DPS than CC Dealers.
We will keep monitoring these heroes for further balance patch.
We are also monitoring other issues for the further balance patches.
As we mentioned via Patch Note on 2nd February, our agenda is to optimize the balance
bit by bit in along term, rather than hurrying to make a huge change at once like our old agenda.

So, we are going to make some balance patches to reduce specific skills and item effects that
can dominate the battle, and make other ways to do it instead.

Second, we are going to buff heroes who are weak compared to others.

We are aware that sometimes Pure Dealers actually record much less DPS than CC Dealers.
We will keep monitoring these heroes for further balance patch.
We are also monitoring other issues for the further balance patches.
As we mentioned via Patch Note on 2nd February, our agenda is to optimize the balance
bit by bit in along term, rather than hurrying to make a huge change at once like our old agenda.

replies.msg: Nerf人都唔buff你

[Enchant Scroll & Hard Solo Dragon Raid Mode]

As mentioned above, T3 item farming will be removed. So, we had to go through
a lot of discussions to come up with the content which can be replaced to provoke
players’ motivation.

So, what is the reason you do T3 item farming?
It was to obtain Gladi and his Unique Weapon to become more powerful.
Since T3 item farming will be gone with the revamp, more time and effort are inevitable
to get an NPC hero and Unique Weapon.
What would be the final content in hero’s growth in the game so far?
The answer is upgrading by the use of Legendary Enchant Scrolls.
Currently, there is no way to acquire Legendary Enchant Scrolls other than from
the Weekly Raid Quest or Limited Sales Event. And it has helped slow down
the speed of further hero growth.


Mainly, there will be two revamps as below.

1) Lv.75 or higher level Dragon Raid: A dragon will drop Enchant Scrolls up to Ancient class.
2) Hard Dragon Raids: A dragon will drop up to Legendary Enchant Scrolls max.
-> With this revamp, you don’t have to focus only on Raid Points.
Just clearing dragon raids will motivate you as well.

In addition, there will be a new content, which is ‘Hard Dragon Raid Solo’.

In this content, you will be able to set your deck of 8 heroes to hunt down a dragon,
just like World Boss battle.
(Since it’s a Solo mode, difficulty will be set accordingly)
Upon clearing Hard Dragon Raid Solo, you will be able to obtain Enchant Scroll up to
Legendary class.

Drop rate will be lower than Hard Dragon Raid, but the good thing is,
you can play Solo Raid whenever you want to play in AUTO mode,
if your heroes are powerful enough.

We are also preparing a function which will enable you to upgrade Enchant Scrolls
by using inferior Enchant Scrolls and some Dragon Scales.

Have you collected enough Dragon Scales? This will be the perfect chance for you to use them!

Lastly, Enchant Scrolls will be given to all party members just like Raid Points,
so you don’t have to bid the scrolls.

replies.msg: 紅字講緊男弓

Plus, there will be two changes on Mileage Points.

1) Items that can be purchased with Cash: Lua’s Token will be given upon purchasing cash items.
2) Items that can be purchased with Ruby: Mileage Points will be given upon purchasing Ruby items.

A lot of people were hesitating to purchase some items because some of them did not include
Mileage Points. However, after the revamp, you don’t have to worry about it.

We will add some more benefits on Cash Items as well.
Lua’s Token is the 2nd Mileage Points. So, that means there will be also items you can purchase
by using Lua’s Tokens.

Along with Special Shop revamp, we will add ‘Class Unique Weapon’ in Special Item Summon.
Even if you don’t have hero’s Unique Weapon, you will be able to use this ‘Class Unique Weapon’
for specific class heroes. Since all class heroes can share the weapon,
the weapon’s performance itself will be lower than casual Unique Weapon,
but it will be a lot easier to acquire.

When Class Unique Weapons are added, some Unique Weapons that rely on the Rune equipment
may have less value than the ones having strong stats. (Like Priest / Knight).

Thank you for reading a long Green Note.
We will always try our best to come up with best ideas for better game service.

replies.msg:
First, we are going to reduce the amount of Rubies you need for recruiting an NPC hero at once.

The reason why we are reducing the required Rubies is simple.

1) If a hero has lower performance compared to the price, people prefer less: May
2) If a hero has quite a good performance compared to the price, people prefer more: Gladi

(Honestly, May is not that bad for a healer. However, we admit there are much better healers
with better skills, compared to the cost to get.)

It might cause balance issues with other heroes when we add more NPC heroes
in the future patches.

So, reducing the Ruby cost is one of the solutions.

Since the ruby cost is very expensive, people barely can try the first method.

To solve these issues, we are going to reduce the cost of Rubies to acquire NPC heroes
and Unique Weapons right away.

In addition, we will try removing T3 Item Farming method. After the revamp,
everyone will be able to recruit NPC heroes if they try hard enough.

We are going to sell some amounts of Friendship Items in Raid Shop much cheaper.

There will be two types of items. Even lower level users will be able to target NPC heroes
and Unique Weapons.

For those who have been farming T3 items, they will be able to collect more Friendship Points
compared to invested time.

Plus, there will be a balance patch on NPC heroes. As we are going to lower the wall of recruiting,
we are also going to do some adjustments on the balance.
This is to set the balance standards for to-be-announced heroes for the future.

Along with NPC Hero Recruit System revamp, we have noticed that high level users may feel
their motivation faded. (I felt that my own playtime would be shortened much.)

So, all members in development team had to think over and over about covering this,
and came to conclusion as below.
